title: clean typeface suggestion for business/lifestyle magazine
content:
Hi everybody

Would love some input into choosing a san serif headline font for a business/lifestyle magazine. Aimed at well-heeled 20-45yo's, want something that is modern, clean, sophisticated but ever-so-slightly groovy. Can this be possible! Something along the lines of Stalemate (which I love) but more serious. Suggestions welcome!!

Thanks
author: fuschia101

comments.content:

[http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Prokyon\_rdrct.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100208074254/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Prokyon_rdrct.html "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Prokyon\_rdrct.html")
